text: Kyoṅki apne nazarāne pesh karne aur apne bachchoṅ ko qurbān karne se tum apne āp ko apne butoṅ se ālūdā karte ho. Ai Isrāīlī qaum, āj tak yihī tumhārā rawaiyā hai! To phir maiṅ kyā karūṅ? Kyā mujhe tumheṅ jawāb denā chāhie jab tum mujh se kuchh dariyāft karne ke lie āte ho? Hargiz nahīṅ! Merī hayāt kī qasam, maiṅ tumheṅ jawāb meṅ kuchh nahīṅ batāūṅgā. Yih Rab Qādir-e-mutlaq kā farmān hai.
